[data-ref=\"sidebar\"].title: Date picker removed from sidebar
[data-ref=\"sidebar\"].content: UI customization includes removing provided items

.calendar-event-log .b-panel-header.title: Logging Panel added to the Sidebar
.calendar-event-log .b-panel-header.content:
Any event interactions are logged here

Logging may be paused and resumed using Ctrl+P

Log may be cleared using Ctrl+K

[data-ref=\"eventNameFilter\"].content:
Filter event name by RegEx.

Use ~ prefix to negate
